name: api_math_Rect
description: A 2D Rectangle defined by X and Y position, width and height.

properties.name: center
properties.description: The position of the center of the rectangle.

properties.name: height
properties.description: The height of the rectangle, measured from the Y position.

properties.name: max
properties.description: The position of the maximum corner of the rectangle.

properties.name: min
properties.description: The position of the minimum corner of the rectangle.

properties.name: position
properties.description: The X and Y position of the rectangle.

properties.name: size
properties.description: The width and height of the rectangle.

properties.name: width
properties.description: The width of the rectangle, measured from the X position.

properties.name: x
properties.description: The X coordinate of the rectangle.

properties.name: xMax
properties.description: The maximum X coordinate of the rectangle.

properties.name: xMin
properties.description: The minimum X coordinate of the rectangle.

properties.name: y
properties.description: The Y coordinate of the rectangle.

properties.name: yMax
properties.description: The maximum Y coordinate of the rectangle.

properties.name: yMin
properties.description: The minimum Y coordinate of the rectangle.

properties.name: Contains
properties.description: Returns true if the x and y components of point is a point inside this rectangle. If allowInverse is

properties.name: Overlaps
properties.description: Returns true if the other rectangle overlaps this one. If allowInverse is present and true, the widt

properties.name: Set
properties.description: Set components of an existing Rect.

properties.name: ToString
properties.description: Returns a formatted string for this Rect.

properties.name: MinMaxRect
properties.description: Creates a rectangle from min/max coordinate values.

properties.name: NormalizedToPoint
properties.description: Returns a point inside a rectangle, given normalized coordinates.

properties.name: PointToNormalized
properties.description: Returns the normalized coordinates corresponding to the point.
